house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1994 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, skylights.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Kitchen Island,Microwave, Pantry, Skylights, Spanish Style, Wet Bar
